title: Kaadu Thiranthe Lyrics Vasool Raja MBBS
stanzas:
<div>
Kaadu Thiranthe Lyrics Vasool Raja MBBS

Kaadu thiranthe
kidakindrathu.
kaatru malargalai
udaikindrathu. (2)

kangal thirandhe kidakindrathu
kadhal uyirkalai udaikindrathu

adadaaa ....
nenjil varum kadhal vali
poovil oru sooraavaliyo.
oo oooh..

nenjai vittu vandha
vaarthai ondru.
thondaikkul soozhkondatho.

unnai vittu udal meelavillai
en kaalgal vaerkondatho.

boomikku vandha
panithuli naan
suriyane ennai kudithuvidu.

yugam yugamaai
naan erindhuvitten
panithuliye ennai anaithuvidu

urave uyirae unarvae
nenjil varum kadhal vali
poovil oru sooraavaliyo.
oo oooh..

sitrinbathin chinna
vaasal vazhi
perinbam naam adaivom.

kaal thadangalattra
boomiyile
kaatraaga naam nulaivom.

chithirai maadhaththai
naam nanaithu
kodaiyil unakkoru
kulir koduppen

margali maadhathai
naan erithu
munpani kaalathil
anal koduppen.

adiye sagiye sukiye
nenjil varum kadhal vali
poovil oru sooraavaliyo.
oo oooh..

Kaadu thiranthe
kidakindrathu.
kaatru malargalai
udaikindrathu.

kangal thirandhe kidakindrathu
kadhal uyirkalai udaikindrathu

adadaaa ....
nenjil varum kadhal vali
poovil oru sooraavaliyo.
oo oooh..

seo.description: Get the complete Kaadu Thiranthe Lyrics Vasool Raja MBBS from Vasool Raja MBBS. Read the lyrics penned by Vairamuthu and composed by Bharadwaj and sung by Hariharan. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Vairamuthu, Vasool Raja MBBS, Bharadwaj, Hariharan, Sadhana Sargam, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
